mapper.sql:
FROM( SELECT CASE BM_TYPE WHEN 'M' THEN '메인영상' END BM_TYPENAME ,B.*, M.MN_NAME BM_MN_MAINNAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_BANNER_MANAGER B2 WHERE B2.BM_MN_KEYNO = M.MN_KEYNO AND B2.BM_TYPE = B.BM_TYPE AND B2.BM_DEL_YN = 'N' AND B2.BM_USE_YN = 'Y') TOTAL_CNT FROM T_BANNER_MANAGER B LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M ON B.BM_MN_KEYNO = M.MN_KEYNO WHERE BM_DEL_YN = 'N' AND BM_USE_YN = #{BM_USE_YN} AND BM_TYPE = 'M' ORDER BY B.BM_LEVEL*1 )AA WHERE 1=1
AND BM_MN_MAINNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BM_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BM_URL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BM_REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BM_LEVEL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND BM_TYPENAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND (
BM_LEVEL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR
BM_MN_MAINNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BM_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BM_URL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BM_REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR BM_TYPENAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') )
mapper.select: SELECT BM_LEVEL , BM_URL ,BM_TITLE FROM T_BANNER_MANAGER B LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M ON B.BM_MN_KEYNO = M.MN_KEYNO WHERE M.MN_KEYNO = #{BM_MN_KEYNO} AND BM_TYPE = 'M' AND BM_DEL_YN = 'N' AND BM_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BM_LEVEL
